notesStmt.note: Vowel points appear to be in secondary hand; parashah breaks are preserved; Deuteronomy V 1 ויקרא - 14 ויום.
Condition: nearly complete, square, broad margins; writing is faded in some places.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Hebrew Oriental square vocalization (Tiberian; later hand)

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
